mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_UID , NUMBER , TITLE , CONTENTS , RSGSTR_ID , VISIT_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(RSGST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS RSGST_DT , USE_YN , REL_DT , (SELECT SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = TR.FILE_NO) AS SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_RELEASEINFO TR WHERE USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY RSGST_DT DESC LIMIT 0,3

SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT NUMBER , TITLE , DATE_FORMAT(RSGST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS RSGST_DT , CONTENTS , VISIT_CNT , RSGSTR_ID , USE_YN , @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_NOTICE ,(SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) ROWNUM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY RSGST_DT DESC ) A ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC LIMIT 0,5

SELECT BOARD_UID , NUMBER , TITLE , CONTENTS ,CASE WHEN CAT_CD = 01 THEN '나이키' WHEN CAT_CD = 02 THEN '아디다스' WHEN CAT_CD = 03 THEN '컨버스' ELSE '기타' END CAT_CD , RSGSTR_ID , VISIT_CNT , DATE_FORMAT(RSGST_DT, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i') AS RSGST_DT , USE_YN , (SELECT SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_FILE WHERE FILE_NO = TR.FILE_NO) AS SAVED_FILE_NM FROM T_REVIEW TR WHERE USE_YN='Y' ORDER BY RSGST_DT DESC LIMIT 0,3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_MBR ( MBR_NO , LOGIN_ID , PWD , PWD_CHG_DT , TMP_PWD_ISSU_DT , LOGIN_FAIL_CNT , CP_NO , EMAIL , RSGSTR_ID , RSGST_DT) VALUE ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(MBR_NO), 0) + 1 FROM T_MBR TM) , #{loginId} , #{pwd} , now() , now() , 0 , #{cpNo} , #{email} , #{loginId} , now() )
